=======
History
=======

0.1.2 (2019-09-19)
==================

* Fix bugs

0.1.1 (2019-09-19)
==================

* Support R
* Improve CLI options
* Support a built-in variable {{_n}}, which represents the universe number
* Support "before_execute" and "after_execute" hooks in the JSON spec
* Update examples

0.1.0 (2019-08-26)
==================

* First release on PyPI.
